name: Chomchobgroup Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of a point consolidation platform designed to offer reward points that can be redeemed for availing of different products or services. The company's platform collects points from credit cards, debit cards, or various loyalty cards and combines them into a single format, enabling users to use the reward points for shopping.
one_liner: Developer of a point consolidation platform designed to offer reward points that can be redeemed for availing of different products or services. The company's platform collects points from credit cards, debit cards, or various loyalty cards and combines them into a single format, enabling users to use the reward points for shopping.
